name: Your World (Edman)
description:
Really simple, and small sandbox-like game. You can shoot boxes, planks, and turrets. You can also build something.

Controls:

W, A, D - Walk and Jump.

1, 2, 3 - Weapons (and empty hands)

Enter - Shoot

E - Allow picking up items

V - No Collision (+No FallDamage)

Esc - Pause

Mouse:

RMB - Create Item

LMB - Select, Unselect

Doublle ScrollClick - Destroy Selected Item

ScrllUp - Rotate right

ScrllDown - Rotate left

Items:

Medkit - Heal

Big Medkit - Bigger heal

Ammo Crate - Gives ammunition

Carton Crate, Wooden Crate - Box

Wooden Plank - Plank

Metal Box - Strong Box

Metal Plank - Strong Plank

Undestroyable Metal Box - Powerfull Box. You can delete it with Doublle ScrollClick (but first select it).

Glass - Vulnerable Box

Turret - It shoots
